TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Vat Grown Insectoids Live Longer
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, increases the lifespan of vat grown insectoids to be more in line with normal ones.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Craftable Sonic Infestation Repeller
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, adds a somewhat balanced cost for the Sonic Infestation Repeller instead of only being available through rewards.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Craftable Bio-Engineering Buildings
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: If enabled, adds a somewhat balanced costs for the bio-engineering structures that are usually only available through rewards.
